Manifolds:

  • Real vector space: \(\mathbb{R}^n\)
  • Symmetric Matrices: \(\operatorname{Sym}(n)\)
  • Skew-symmetric Matrices: \(\operatorname{Skew}(n)\)
  • Sphere: \(\mathbb{S}^n\)
  • Special Orthogonal Group: \(\operatorname{SO}(n)\)
  • Stiefel Manifold: \(\operatorname{St}(n,k)\)
  • Grassmannian Manifold: \(\operatorname{Gr}(n,k)\)
  • Variety of Low Rank Matrices: \(\operatorname{LowRank}(n,k,r)\)

Skew-symmetric Matrices: \(\operatorname{Skew}(n)\)¶

\(\operatorname{Skew}(n)\) is the vector space of skew-symmetric matrices:

\[\operatorname{Skew}(n) = \{X \in \mathbb{R}^{n \times n}\:\mid\: X^\intercal = -X \}\]
class geotorch.skew.Skew(size, lower=True)[source]¶

Vector space of skew-symmetric matrices, parametrized in terms of the upper or lower triangular part of the matrix.

Parameters

  • size (torch.size) – Size of the tensor to be applied to

  • lower (bool) – Optional. Uses the lower triangular part of the matrix to parametrize the matrix. Default: True
